get.summary: Get earnings for a given ethereum address
get.description: Get the token based earnings for all jars and their current USD valuation

get.summary: Chart data for historic jar assets under management
get.description: Return an array of data point objects with coordinate values corresponding to jar asset USD valuation

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of data points to limit response

get.summary: Chart data for historic jar performance and estimated ROI per jar
get.description: Return an array of data point objects with coordinate values corresponding to jar ratio coupled with multiple ROI values for sampled periods

get.summary: Retrieve value locked in all jars and protocol
get.description: Jar values are pulled from indexed chain data with the total value included as the sum of all jars

get.summary: Chart data for historic staking percentages
get.description: Return an array of data point objects with coordinate values corresponding to staked PICKLE

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of data points to limit response
